name: Readmanga.today - Dark (Unsupported)
description:
Removed a bunch of useless stuff, changed most elements to dark.///
There won't be anymore updates for this, feel free to fork/make your own.
additional_info:
Suggestions -
1. Use an Adblocker (ublock recommended)
2. Install Greasemonkey/Tampermonkey and use https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/692-manga-loader
It will let you read the entire chapter in a single page, like webcomics.

---
update1 - fixed manga title overlapping with chapter title if it was too long
update2 - changed search dropdown bg and login stuff
update3 - fixed some length issues
update4 - blocked new flash ads
update5 - fixed search results
update6 - updated according to the new changes
update7 - blocked a few things I forgot to add
update8 - fixed some manga descriptions having white backgrounds
update9 - blocked more ads
update10 - removed some extra space
css:
@-moz-document url("http://www.readmanga.today/"), url-prefix("http://www.readmanga.today/hot-manga"), url-prefix("http://www.readmanga.today/latest-releases"), url-prefix("http://www.readmanga.today/search"), url-prefix("http://www.readmanga.today/category") {
/* TRASH */

.slider,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(7),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(12),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(13),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(20)

{display: none;}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.readmanga.today/") {
/* WALLPAPER */

body {background: #000 url('http://i.imgur.com/TQqIhkf.jpg') no-repeat !important;}

/* MORE TRASH */

#swfSlot,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(1),
div.discussions,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(3),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(5),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > a.btn.btn-google.btn-block,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(9),
#social_widget,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(14),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(15),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(16),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > center,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > form,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > p,
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div:nth-child(24),
div.col-right.col-md-4 > div.latest-comments,
div.row.movie-meta > div > div > div.panel-body > div.col-md-9 > dl > dd:nth-child(13),
.panel>.list-group .list-group-item:first-child,
div.row.cast,
div.row.comment-form,
.footer .inner,
.pull-left > a.btn.btn-xs.btn-default,
.list-switcher-2 li.report-err-btn,
.chapter_right_160x600,
.chapter_left_160x600,
center,
.pull-left,
.content-list.col-md-12.hot-manga > a,
.content-list.col-md-12 > a

{display: none !important;}

/* NOT TRASH */

div#chapters_container.row.comment-form {display: inherit !important; position: inherit !important;}
.col-right {padding-top: 0px;}

.manga-item {border: none;}

.manga_updates dt {height: auto;}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.readmanga.today/") {
/* TEXT COLOR */

body,
.chp_lst li a,
.col-single .movie-meta .panel .list-group ul li a,
.alert-info,
.manga_updates dd a,
.close,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li .sub-categories>li>a,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li .sub-categories>li>a .counter,
.col-right .similar-movies ul li .views, .col-right .similar-movies ul li .comments,
.col-left .content-list .box .meta>ul>li,
.manga-item a,
a,
.content .nav-tabs a,
.content .lol-right .content .movies>ul>li .comment,
.col-left .content-list .box .body .right>ul>li a

{color: #BBB; text-shadow: none;}

.header .navigation .tools .dropdown-menu li a
{color: #BBB !important;}


/* BLUE TEXT COLOR */

.col-right .similar-movies ul li .movie-title,
.manga_updates dt a,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li .sub-categories>li>a:hover .counter,
.col-left .content-list .box .title h2 a,
.content .lol-right .content .movies>ul>li .meta .user>a

{color: #37a8e7;}

.header .navigation ul>li>a:hover,
.header .navigation .tools>ul>li>a:hover {color: #37a8e7;}

.content .nav-tabs a:hover {background: none;}

/* VISITED LINKS */

.manga_updates dd a:visited,
.chp_lst li a:visited,
p.mangaChaterLink > a:visited

{color: #666 !important;}

/* MAIN HEADER */

.header .navigation,
.content .nav-tabs li.active a,
.header .navigation .tools-dropdown,
.header .navigation .login-dropdown

{background-color: #222 !important;}

.header .navigation .tools-dropdown,
.header .navigation .login-dropdown
{box-shadow: 0 0 15px 3px #111; }

/* HEADERS BACKGROUND */

.col-left .content-list .pagination>li.active a,
.col-left .content-list .style-thumbnail ul li a.title,
.col-left .content-list .box .title,
.col-single .content-list .pagination>li.active a,
.col-single .photo-gallery .panel .panel-heading .gallery-prev:hover,
.col-single .photo-gallery .panel .panel-heading .gallery-next:hover,
.col-single .comment-form .panel .panel-heading,
.col-single .movie-meta .panel .panel-heading,
.col-single .movie-meta .dl-horizontal dd,
.col-single .movie-meta .panel .list-group ul li,
.content .lol-left .movie-of-the-day .movie-title,
.content .lol-right .content .style-thumbnail ul li a.title,
.content .lol-right .content .discussion-form .panel .panel-heading,
.col-right .title,
.col-right .movie-of-the-day .movie-title,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li>a,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li .sub-categories>li>a .counter,
.btn-google:hover,
.btn-google,
.header .navigation .tools>ul>li,
.col-left .col-top .list-switcher li a,
.col-right .similar-movies ul li .views,
.header .navigation ul>li.home,
.col-right .similar-movies ul li .comments,
.col-left .col-top,
.hot-manga-dl-horizontal dd,
.hot-manga .meta,
.alert-info,
.thumbnail,
.manga-list .manga-letters a,
.tt-dropdown-menu,
.dropdown-menu,
.content .lol-right .content .title,
.content .nav-tabs li.active a,
.content .nav-tabs li a:hover,
.form-control[readonly],
.input-group-addon:last-child,
.content .lol-right .content .movies>ul>li .comment,
.content .lol-right .content .movies>ul>li .meta,
.col-left .content-list .box .body .right>ul>li,
.col-left .content-list .box .meta

{background-color: #333 !important;}

/* PAGE INNNER BACKGROUND */

.panel,
.list-group-item,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li .sub-categories>li>a,
.col-left .content-list,
.hot-manga .box,
.content .lol-left,
.content .lol-right,
.modal-content,
.col-left .content-list .box

{background-color: #222 !important;}

/* ICONS BACKGROUND */

.col-right .title span[class^="icon-"],
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li>a span[class^="icon-"],
.col-single .movie-meta .panel .list-group ul li span[class^="icon-"],
.col-right .similar-movies ul li .views span[class^="icon-"],
.col-right .similar-movies ul li .comments span[class^="icon-"],
.pagination>li>a,
.pagination>li>span,
.btn-success,
.btn-default,
.content .lol-right .content .movies>ul>li .movie-title

{background-color: #444 !important; color: #EEE !important;}

.icon-trash {background: none; color: #EEE;}


/* RIGHT HEADERS BORDER */

.content .lol-right .content .discussion-form .panel,
.content .lol-right .content .discussion-form .panel .panel-heading,
.col-left .content-list .pagination>li.active a,
.col-single .content-list .pagination>li.active a,
.col-single .movie-meta .panel,
.col-single .cast .panel .panel-body .cast-list>li.director .thumbnail,
.col-single .comment-form .panel,
.col-single .comment-form .panel .panel-heading,
.panel-primary>.panel-heading,
.col-left .content-list .box .body .right>ul>li

{border-color: #222 !important;}

/* MANGA PAGE BACKGROUND */

.col-single .content-list

{background-color: #111 !important;}

/* RIGHT PAGE BACKGROUND + SHADOW */

.col-right,
.header .social-login>ul>li.search form .tt-query

{background-color: #222 !important; box-shadow: inset 2px 0 5px 0 #111 !important;}

/* DARKER BORDER */

.list-group-item,
.header .navigation .tools>ul>li,
.manga_updates dl,
.alert-info,
.pagination>li>a,
.pagination>li>span,
.col-right .category-list .main-categories>li .sub-categories>li>a,
.col-right .similar-movies ul li,
.col-left .content-list .box .body .left,
.hot-manga .box,
.btn-success,
.col-left .content-list .box .body .right .summary,
.col-left .content-list .box .meta,
.thumbnail,
.manga-list-box,
.btn-default,
.content .nav-tabs li.active a,
.content .nav-tabs li a:hover,
.input-group-addon:last-child,
.content .lol-left

{border-color: #333 !important;}

/* BANNER/LOGO THING */

.header .logo a {content: url('http://i.imgur.com/5srBuJh.png');}

/* OTHER TINY STUFF */

.col-left .content-list .box .meta>ul>li span[class^="icon-"]

{ color: #EEE; text-shadow: none;}

.col-left .content-list .box .title span[class^="icon-"],
.manga-list .manga-letters a.active

{background-color: #37a8e7 !important;}

.col-left .content-list .box {border-radius: 4px;}

form#login > div.username > input.form-control,
form#login > div.password > input.form-control,
.form-control
{background-color: #333; text-align: center; border: none; text-indent: 0%;}

.col-right, .header .social-login>ul>li.search form .tt-query {text-align: left !important;}

input:-webkit-autofill, textarea:-webkit-autofill, select:-webkit-autofill 
{-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0px 1000px #333 inset !important; border-radius: 0px;}

.content .nav-tabs {border-bottom: 0px;}

/* SEARCH STUFF */

.col-left .content-list .box .body .right .summary {border-bottom: none;}
.col-left .content-list .box .body {border-left: 1px solid #333; border-right: 1px solid #333; }

/* RECENT CHANGES */

.hot-manga .meta>ul li:last-child {width: 115px;}

.manga_updates dt a {width: 500px; display: inline-block;}

#pageUpBtn {-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%); filter: grayscale(100%);}

div.pull-left > select.form-control.input-sm.jump-menu, ul.list-switcher-2 > li > select.form-control.input-sm.jump-menu {background: #EEE;}

select.input-sm  { background: #444;}

div#pageUpBtn {bottom: 6%;}

.form-control {color: #BBB;}

.manga-cat span.icon-checkmark, .manga-cat span.icon-cross {background: transparent !important; margin-top: auto;}

li.list-group-item.movie-detail > p > span {color: #BBB !important; font-family: "Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif !important; background: none !important;}

.panel {margin-bottom: 0px;}
}
